mapper.sql: SELECT m_prj_version.id, m_prj_version.projectId, m_prj_version.description, m_prj_version.duedate, m_prj_version.name, m_prj_version.createdUser, m_prj_version.sAccountId, m_prj_version.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_version.createdTime, m_prj_version.status, (SELECT COUNT(m_prj_bug.id) FROM m_prj_bug, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_bug.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Bug' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Version' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('AffVersion','FixVersion') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_version.id) AS numBugs, (SELECT COUNT(m_prj_bug.id) FROM m_prj_bug, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_bug.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Bug' AND m_prj_bug.status IN ('Open', 'InProgress', 'Reopenned') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Version' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('AffVersion','FixVersion') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_version.id) AS numOpenBugs, (SELECT COUNT(m_prj_task.id) FROM m_prj_task, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_task.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Task' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Version' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('AffVersion') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_version.id) AS numTasks, (SELECT COUNT(m_prj_task.id) FROM m_prj_task, m_prj_ticket_relation WHERE m_prj_task.id = m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketId AND m_prj_ticket_relation.ticketType = 'Project-Task' AND m_prj_task.status IN ('Open') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.type = 'Project-Version' AND m_prj_ticket_relation.rel IN ('AffVersion') AND m_prj_ticket_relation.typeId = m_prj_version.id) AS numOpenTasks, m_prj_project.name AS projectName, m_prj_project.shortName AS projectShortName FROM m_prj_version LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_version.projectId = m_prj_project.id)
